title: How to Start a Podcast in 2025
description: Beginner’s guide to launching a podcast
body: Podcasting is booming in 2025. This guide walks you through setting up, recording, and promoting your show.

title: Why Rust is Taking Over Backend Dev
description: An overview of Rust's rise in backend engineering
body: Rust’s safety, performance, and growing ecosystem are making it a top pick for building scalable backends.

title: The Truth About Freelancing in 2025
body: The gig economy is evolving fast. Learn what it takes to succeed, and avoid burnout.

title: Why Gen Z Loves Notion

body: More than a productivity app, Notion is a digital playground for Gen Z’s creativity and organization.

title: Why You Shouldn’t Skip Sleep for Hustle
description: The long-term cost of late nights
body: Sleep deprivation doesn’t lead to success. It leads to burnout, bad health, and short-term thinking.

title: Learning to Code With No Internet
description: One developer’s story from rural Africa
body: Meet Musa, who taught himself to code using old PDFs and no internet access for months.

title: The Realities of Building a Startup Alone
body: Being a solo founder is lonely, exhausting, and risky. Here’s what they don’t tell you.

title: 5 Underrated Tools for Designers

body: From icon generators to feedback tools, these underrated resources are a must for every designer.

description: How I pivoted into Developer Relations
body: I started as a backend dev. Now I speak at conferences. Here’s how I transitioned into DevRel.

title: Why You Need a Personal Website

body: LinkedIn is not your platform. Owning a personal site gives you control, SEO, and authority.

title: The Dark Side of Hustle Culture
body: We talk about burnout, but the real danger is how normalized it’s become. Here's why that needs to change.

title: What Makes a Good API Developer?
body: A great API dev designs for users first, writes clean docs, and thinks in scale. Here’s how to level up.

title: How AI is Changing Education in Africa
description: A look at EdTech and AI’s impact
body: Startups are bringing personalized, AI-powered learning tools to students in remote African villages.

title: Node.js vs Deno: 2025 Verdict
description: Which is better for modern apps?
body: Deno’s security and simplicity are impressive, but Node.js still leads in community and tooling.

title: Can You Build a SaaS in 30 Days?
body: From idea to MVP — here’s what I learned building and launching a SaaS product in just one month.
